name: 王凡
objective: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
schedule:
Week 1-6 We will focus on action movies and the style of Quentin Tarantino
Week 7-8 We will focus on comedy movies
Week 9 Mid-term exam
Week 10-11 We will continue to focus on comedy and novels that were made into movies.
Week 12-15 We will focus on drama.
Week 16-17 Final presentation
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Mid term exam 20%
Attendance & class performance 25%
Final Presentation 30%
Final Exam 25%
materials: The most updated online movie review and novels that were made into movies.
